آسٹریلین گرانڈ پری 1932 میں منعقد ہوئی: Was the Australian Grand Prix held in 1932? Australian Grand Prix 1932

The 1932 Australian Grand Prix was a motor race held at the Phillip Island circuit in Victoria, Australia on 14 March 1932. It was the fifth Australian Grand Prix and the fifth to be held at Phillip Island.
Was the Australian Grand Prix held in 1932? Australian Grand Prix 1932
The race, in which there were 18 starters, was won by Bill Thompson driving a Bugatti. Thompson was also awarded the Herald Trophy for recording the fastest time of the race.
آسٹریلین گرانڈ پری ایک موٹر اسپورٹ ریس ت: What is the Australian Grand Prix? Australian Grand Prix motorsport race
The Australian Grand Prix is an annual Formula One motor racing event, taking place in Melbourne, Victoria. The event is contracted to be held at least until 2035.
What is the Australian Grand Prix? Australian Grand Prix motorsport race
Date founded: 1996
What is the Australian Grand Prix? Australian Grand Prix motorsport race
Circuit length: 5.278 km (3.280 miles)
What is the Australian Grand Prix? Australian Grand Prix motorsport race
Laps: 58
What is the Australian Grand Prix? Australian Grand Prix motorsport race
Most wins (constructors): Ferrari (14)
What is the Australian Grand Prix? Australian Grand Prix motorsport race

Historically, the Australian Grand Prix was held as either the last race of the season, when held at Adelaide, or as the opening round or early on at Melbourne. In 2022, it returned to the calendar as the third race of the season, following the Bahrain and Saudi Arabian Grands Prix.
